snippet: Former champion Roger Federer withdrew from the French Open on Thursday, citing fitness issues, as his record run of appearing at 65 consecutive grand slam tournaments came to an end....
lead_paragraph: Former champion Roger Federer withdrew from the French Open on Thursday, citing fitness issues, as his record run of appearing at 65 consecutive grand slam tournaments came to an end.

headline.print_headline: Injured Federer to Miss French Open
headline.main: Injured Federer to Miss French Open
